title: About a year ago, a middle-aged female tourist died while scuba diving off our local waters.  I asked for cause of death. You replied that you would have to wait for the Coast Guard to complete their investigation.  I followed-up and you said that they Coast Guard was behind due to helping with Hurrican Katrina relief efforts. I\'m following-up once again.
text:
Here's a link to the answer to your question.



http://www.myreporter.com/?p=11371
